entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
